doc.previous: The theorem states that the average of many independent and identically distributed random variables with finite variance tends towards a normal distribution irrespective of the distribution followed by the original random variables Formally let be independent random variables with mean and variance Then the sequence of random variables
doc.after: converges in distribution to a standard normal random variable
